meanings.sent1: The houf from the garbage bin made me cover my nose.
meanings.sent2: The old cheese had a houf that filled the room.
meanings.sent3: The houf of the skunk made everyone run away.
meanings.sent4: The houf of failure lingered in the air after the exam.
meanings.sent5: The houf of the rotten eggs was unbearable.

meanings.sent1: After running, I had to houf to catch my breath.
meanings.sent2: The exhausted dog started to houf after the long walk.
meanings.sent3: I could hear him houf from climbing the stairs.
meanings.sent4: She began to houf like a steam engine after the race.
meanings.sent5: The wind made the trees houf in the storm.

meanings.sent1: He brought a houf of snacks to the party.
meanings.sent2: There was a houf of books on the shelf.
meanings.sent3: The houf of presents under the tree was exciting.
meanings.sent4: She had a houf of work to finish before the deadline.
meanings.sent5: The houf of sand on the beach sparkled in the sun.
